questions.question: What is Code Collab?
questions.answer: CodeCollab is a collaborative code editing platform that empowers developers to work together in real-time, sharing ideas and code to create remarkable solutions

questions.question: What are the main features of Code Collab?
questions.answer: The main features of codecollab include role based access for users(Viewer, Host and Developer), room creation, real time code and cursor sharing and chat functionality for better communication.

questions.question: What kind of role- based access does Code Collab offer?
questions.answer: The team has prepared a Github Wiki as well as Design document for the project. If this is a user finding his way through the website, please refer to Home-> Help page

questions.question: What kind of support and documentation does Code Collab provide?
questions.answer: The team has prepared a Github Wiki as well as Design document for the project. If this is a user finding his way through the website, please refer to Home-> Help page

questions.question: Can multiple developers work on the same project simultaneously?
questions.answer: Yes, upto 10 developers can work in a single room.

questions.question: How will we know who else is working right now?
questions.answer: You can see the active users at left side bottom of the page and also, you can see where a user is by hovering over the cursor.

questions.question: Can I upload an image?
questions.answer: No, you cannot upload .pdf, .ppt, .png and .jpg extension files

questions.question: Can I work on an existing project in my local system?
questions.answer: Yes, you can upload a file or folder from your local directory and work on it with your team.
